attributes.description:
Excellent condition for a One Owner Vehicle with Full Franchise Service History and balance of VW Automotion Maintenance Plan till September 2023 or 150 000km.

20" BF Goodrich tyres, Paint Protection Film on front end of vehicle, Takla Seat Covers, Towbar and Armadillo cover.

Car City Secunda is a reputable dealer with over 20 years experience in motor retail. All vehicles get issued a roadworthy certificate upon delivery. 

We do assist with finance and deliver countrywide to make your experience as effortless as possible. All trade inn’s welcome. Optional Mechanical warranties and service plans also available for your peace of mind. 

Price excludes Administration, Delivery & Registration costs. 

Become part of the Car City Secunda family!!

Please visit our website https://carcitysecunda.co.za/
